scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.test:unit: pnpm --filter backend test:unit && pnpm --filter frontend test:unit
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:integration
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
